Banner.Description: I have 4 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular, React, Next.Js, Node/Nest.js, and Fast Api, applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 4 years of experience I have covered many roles: Backend Developer and Frontend Developer. I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My capabilities also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I am working on.
I also program things for my personal use, whether for hobby or utility.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer
Description: Enterprise Data Warehouse Testing - prepared Test cases, validated MYSQL-based Data Warehouse through several stages, and prepared reports.
Performed function, stress, and load API testing.
Took charge of testing an Internal system module by holding meetings with developers and then signed off the module ready for production.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer
Description: Worked as a Full stack developer on the car wash Service Project including API development, UI development, testing, database management, and deployment.
Contributed to mobile and telegram bot development.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer
Description: Worked as a Full stack developer on the Auction application Project including API development, UI development, testing, database management, and deployment.
Used Angular and Aws Lambda as tech stack and Jest for testing.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Mean Stack Developer
Description: Worked on a SaaS website with three main applications: Customer, Restaurant, and Admin.
Led a code refactoring initiative, improving code maintainability and reducing technical debt by 40%.
Implemented new features in an accounting software used by customer clients, enhancing financial reporting accuracy.
Assisted in developing web services enabling seamless integration with third-party services, enhancing system interoperability.
Established automated testing frameworks which reduced bug rates by 60% in delivered software products.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Freelancer
Description: Continuous improvements implementation, working on frontend and backend.
Creation of platforms with Angular, React, Next.js, FastAPi, Nest, Node and programmed with functional, reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Process automation with data structures.
Template designs with SASS, Bootstrap, Materialize, Bulma, etc.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Mern Stack Developer
Description: Collaborated with UX/UI design teams to enhance the overall website experience.
Developed a user interface for external users and an administrative interface for internal use using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Material-UI.
Increased income of the charity organization by integrating an easy-to-use donation payment system called Chappa.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer
Description: Developed an Angular and .NET-based frontend and backend for an Integrated Management Information System platform, enhancing user experience and increasing conversions by 15%.
Optimized database queries on SQL Server, reducing data retrieval times by 40% and supporting business analytics.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design a responsive web layout, increasing mobile user engagement by 20%.
Conducted thorough code reviews and introduced unit testing practices, contributing to a 99.9% uptime for critical applications.
Ensured web application security by integrating industry-standard encryption, thwarting potential data breaches.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Inboxwave.com
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A smart, scalable platform that automates and simplifies customer messaging—starting with Instagram DMs. Our mission is to help creators, influencers, and brands engage their audiences faster and more efficiently using AI-powered conversations.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: LLM Sermon Platform
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An innovative platform designed to support ministers and pastors by leveraging AI tools to enhance sermon preparation.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tabcode SAAS
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Tabcode SaaS is a comprehensive platform tailored for the restaurant industry, featuring three core modules: a Customer App, an Admin Panel, and a Restaurant App. Built using Node.js for the backend and Angular for the frontend, Tabcode enables smooth management of restaurant operations, seamless customer interaction, and efficient administrative control—all within a scalable SaaS architecture

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Hope for children
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Hope for Children is a charity-focused web platform built with Next.js , React , Redux , Tailwind CSS , and .NET . It allows the organization to showcase their projects, alumni stories, success journeys, and children’s histories to drive awareness and support. Integrated with Chapa as a payment gateway, it enables secure and seamless donations to help transform lives.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Awan Awalia
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Awalia is a modern car wash application where users can register their vehicles and purchase service packages for convenient, on-demand car cleaning. The platform is built using Next.js , RTK Query , Tailwind CSS , and NestJS for the web, with a Flutter mobile app for cross-platform access—delivering a smooth and responsive experience for both users and service providers.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Instacart
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Instacart is an eCommerce platform where users can browse , order food , and have it delivered to their doorstep with ease. Built using Angular , RxJS , and a reactive architecture, it offers a fast and responsive user experience tailored for real-time interactions and smooth order management.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: chain docs
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: ChainDocs is a secure document validation platform powered by blockchain technology. It ensures authenticity and tamper-proof verification of documents. The platform is built using Next.js for the frontend and Node.js with Express on the backend, providing a fast, trustworthy, and scalable solution for digital document verification.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: IMIS(Integrated Management Information System)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: IMIS (Integrated Management Information System) is a centralized platform designed to streamline research management, document handling, and library systems. Built with Angular , NGXS for state management, and a .NET backend, IMIS offers a robust and efficient solution for managing academic and institutional information workflows.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Gojjo Rental System
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Gojjo is a modern house rental platform that connects tenants with property owners, making it easy to browse, book, and manage rental homes. Built using React, Node.js/Express

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: AAU Clearance System
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: AAU Clearance System is a student clearance platform designed to simplify and streamline the university clearance process. Built using Spring Boot and styled with HTML/CSS

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Auction Application System
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Auction Application System is a dynamic platform for managing online auctions, enabling users to bid, sell, and track items in real-time. Developed with Angular on the frontend and powered by AWS Lambda on the backend

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Aladia Education website
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: E-learning platform developed with WordPress. Fully customized design, with plugins developed from scratch. It has a customized payment module, virtual classroom, course tracking dashboard.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
